entries.meaning: (publishing) A list of older books available from a publisher, as opposed to the frontlist of more recent titles.

verbs.description: backlist (third-person singular simple present backlists, present participle backlisting, simple past and past participle backlisted)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To hold back a student's application (to a college etc.) based on whether a preferred candidate declines their offer.
examples: I have not heard back from the college yet: I must have been backlisted.

entries.meaning: (transitive, publishing) To place (a book) on a backlist.
